name: Homestuck / Dark Theme
description:
A dark theme for the new homestuck.com website.
========================================
IF THERE ARE ANY ISSUES WITH THIS, PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE TO CONTACT ME AND LET ME KNOW THE PROBLEM
additional_info:
UPDATE || 12/04/2018
- footer is now the correct colour
- new scroll bar
- fixed most of the fonts ("courier-std" ==> "courier")
- fixed line spacing
- changed the colour of the button
- made it easier to see most pesterlogs (given a background)
- added the WV storyline dark mode
- [o] no longer looks odd (reverted to normal)
- other changes

discussions.name: the writing is bold and hard to read
